page.title: 15Industry in the Royston Area
page.content: There is some light industry. Most of it is on the York Way Industrial Estate. Johnson Matthey is the biggest employer. The next biggest are E.T.D. Lampshades and Erith Building supplies Many of the firms are quite small.They make all kinds of things: motoring accessories, cables, pens and printed circuits for computers. There are 28 firms. Some of them employ people who work in their own homes. There are similar small firms dotted around Royston. There is no primary industry in the area. The secondary industries include car parts,clothes,pottery, lampshades and stationery. Tertiany jobs include shop assistants, transport workers, office workers, T.V. engineers and many others.
